entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
